channel.title: AFK ICON next to disconnected players' names
channel.description: We need a bright icon to light up next to players' names when they are disconnected so Prince stops losing exes to them

item.title: AFK ICON next to disconnected players' names
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
This would only be for disconnected players where everyone gets a system message “Player has disconnected”, it wouldn’t affect anyone’s ability to fake AFK

Also this is the first time a developer liked my post so yay

Read full topic
item.source: AFK ICON next to disconnected players' names

item.title: AFK ICON next to disconnected players' names
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
I don’t know how I feel about this, because then scum can’t fake afk anymore.

I also don’t know how I feel about scum faking that to be honest

Read full topic
